dt: {bc}a card game the object of which is to be dealt cards having a higher count than those of the dealer up to but not exceeding 21
{bc}an ace and a {d_link|face card|face card} or ten as the first two cards dealt to a player in the game of blackjack
{bc}a hand weapon typically consisting of a piece of leather-enclosed metal with a strap or springy shaft for a handle
{bc}a tankard for beer or ale usually of tar-coated leather
{bc}an often scrubby oak ({it}Quercus marilandica{/it}) chiefly of the southeastern U.S.

shortdef: a card game the object of which is to be dealt cards having a higher count than those of the dealer up to but not exceeding 21 —called also twenty-one, vingt-et-un
an ace and a face card or ten as the first two cards dealt to a player in the game of blackjack —called also natural, twenty-one
a hand weapon typically consisting of a piece of leather-enclosed metal with a strap or springy shaft for a handle
to coerce with threats or pressure
